item.title: Trump announces pardon for Democratic Rep Henry Cuellar
item.description: President Donald Trump announced a “full and unconditional pardon" Wednesday for Rep. Henry Cuellar, D-Texas, and his wife, Imelda.

item.title: House Republicans back Trump's Venezuela moves for now as escalation uncertainty looms
item.description: House Republicans are backing President Donald Trump's moves against Venezuela but are cautiously seeking more information on what happens next.
